attributes.title: Worthless app do not recommend
attributes.review: I really wish I could rate this app zero stars. It is completely unhelpful and terribly made. It crashed my phone!!!! Please do something about this it is disgusting and horrible

attributes.title: The app is bad
attributes.review: No one like Donald Trump he lock kids in a Cage and away from the family what happened that was your kids how would you feel that’s why Trump should not have his own app or be president

attributes.title: Worst App Possible
attributes.review: I downloaded this app expecting that it was going to be a great app for the news, since its “#1 news” app. This Donald Trump app skews so far right the nazis would enjoy it.  Unbiased news sources are WAY better.  This app is absolute trash.

attributes.title: Ugly President
attributes.review:
When I first opened the app I was greeted by a ugly Cheeto and was disgusted by the face and it made me throw up 🤢🤮🤢🤮🤢🤮 hopefully everyone understands that a Cheeto on the front cover is very offensive and discrimination towards Gen Z and ⏰ers 
Please remove the Cheeto off of the front cover to make it more appealing.

attributes.title: No thank you
attributes.review: First of all I got really scared because I saw ugly Chito on my screen second of all I don’t feel comfortable putting in my email because I don’t want him to get my information he’s pretty scary

attributes.title: worst app in app store
attributes.review: this app is horrible, the Trump administration has no clue what they’re doing and it’s a shame for the people in the country. WE NEED TO VOTE HIM OUT! i heard about how horribly run this app is form a friend and had to see myself. they were right!

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: I wanted to get to know the president even tho he has a warrant I wanted to give him a chance but as soon as I open the app I seen a picture of an expired hot Cheeto and now I am in the bathroom throwing up disgusting don’t download this app

attributes.title: This needs to be deleted. ASAP
attributes.review: i was highly disappointed. personally i did not want to see a fat cheeto man who is homophobic, racist and plain stupid. this app could be better if you deleted it as a whole.

OK i downloaded it to give a real review 💯 but geuss what this is so fake❌😾 i dont recomend💆‍♂️ period🥱 anyways the 5 star reviews are trump and his family so don’t trust them 🙅‍♂️ ALSO that fist ✊🏻 he is doing is fake he does n  out support black lives matter
